reviews.review: 6 лет назад купил, поиграл 500 часов, игра надоела только из-за того что каждый второй играет на запрещенных читах. Если хотите честной игры, то купите прайм статус за  15$ ,  А за что? Да за то что ты игру не купил в 2016г )

toxische Community... 
In fast jedem Ranked Spiel gibt es einen Opportunisten der immer glaubt er sei DER Spieler und alle andere müssen von ihm lernen! 

Wenn es nicht einfach so viel Spaß machen würde... Aber durch die Community wird es leider stark abgewertet.

ЭТА ИГРА ДЕРЬМО ЕБАНОЕ, Я ЖАЛЕЮ ЧТО ПРОВЁЛ 1200 ЧАСОВ СВОЕЙ ЖИЗНИ В ЭТОЙ ПОМОЙКЕ БЛЯТЬ ЧИТЕРЫ, БАГИ С ЗАПУСКОМ, БАГИ С ФПС, РАЗРАБОТЧИКАМ ПЛЕВАТЬ НА ИГРУ, ВАЛЬВ ВЫМРИТЕ НАХУЙ С ЭТОГО МИРА

hilelerle ilgili bir düzenleme yapılmıyor, biz boşuna 2500-5000 saat oynuyoruz, boşuna overwach bakıyoruz, hiç bişey olmuyor, cs go artık cağdışı bir oyun, hiçbir hileyi durduramaz, sadece overwach için birde üstüne üstlük o kadar para veriyorsunuz karşınıza gelen kişi seçkin değil hile yok almayın paranıza yazık.......

It's like heroin or something. It starts out really fun and addicting, until it's not fun anymore and you just want to get your next fix. It ruins your life and on top of that you have an extraordinary toxic community, consisting of people who are definitely too young to play the game, griefers, racists, nazis, disgusting sexists and worse (Reporting them is useless btw).

With a community like that, which really likes to troll and grief you, even if you play your best and communicate, it's also basically impossible to get out of silver in matchmaking. You need friends which I don't have because, wise as they are, they wouldn't play CS:GO voluntarily.

Avoid the game if you want to have a good life.
